name: Projective Transformation Image Registration
title: Image Registration
description: This plugin registers an image collection
author: Gauhar Bains (gauhar.bains@labshare.org), Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.description: Filename pattern used to separate data

inputs.name: template
inputs.description: Template image to be used for image registration

inputs.name: registrationVariable
inputs.description: variable to help identify which images need to be registered to each other

inputs.name: TransformationVariable
inputs.description: variable to help identify which images have similar transformation

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

ui.title: Filename pattern
ui.description: Filename pattern used to separate data

ui.title: Template Image
ui.description: Template image to be used for image registration

ui.title: Registration Variable
ui.description: variable to help identify which images need to be registered to each other

ui.title: Similar Transformation Variable
ui.description: variable to help identify which images have similar transformation

ui.title: Deformation method
ui.description: Projective (8 degrees of freedom), Affine (6 degrees of freedom), Partial Affine (4 degrees of freedom)
